sessions.name: Panel discussion + Q&A
sessions.description: The importance of internal communication within organisations is very misunderstood. Too much irrelevant content often results in information silos. Meaning, information that is actually important to an employee can easily get lost. Startups are the olympics of entrepreneurship and thus we would like to introduce you to Unlimited tools and resources suited to meet any of your business/startup needs.
tracks: Business HustleÂ© Presentation & Introduction of panelists

sessions.name: Networking + Elevator Pitch Session
sessions.description: we aim to create a safe environment for entrepreneurs, authors, creatives, digital nomads, etc to sit together and have non intrusive conversations about entrepreneurship, the world of business and open-source resources accessible to/for particular industries online.

sessions.name: Session Break
sessions.description: The idea of an elevator pitch is to intrigue your listener and create interest, whenever you answer the common 'What do you do? question. This part of the event is a wonderful opportunity to practice your 60 seconds elevator pitch while having fun with like minded attendees.

sessions.name: The Topic for the day: Identifying Your Strengths in the Marketplace
sessions.description: Join us for the day as we unpack the above topic. Whether you're a creative, author, designers and/or entrepreneur developing a structure or a plan of action for your business can be a daunting and expensive task. Let us help you run and grow your business efficiently by effectively networking within a likeminded community

sessions.name: List of Questions - Q&A Session
sessions.description: The following questions will be presented to the panelists during the panel discussion session. (a)How do you identify a skill that you can bank on? (b) How do you measure rediness or competence in your abilities? (c) How does one constantly improve and learn from the change that comes with improving?

speakers.name: Vuyiswa Mataka
speakers.about: Vuyiswa holds a BCom from the University of Pretoria & has successfully placed tech talent like Development Managers, Software Engineers (C#.Net, Java, ReactJs) and many more throughout my 5 year career.
speakers.title: Technical consultant

speakers.name: Hovhannes Rafayelyan
speakers.about: WiFi Artists is a community of remote workers, entrepreneurs, and digital nomads who travel the world together. We interview and select like-minded individuals for 1- to 12-month trips around the world. Our groups travel to a different country each month, working remotely while experiencing new places and cultures.
speakers.title: C.E.O @ Wifi Artists
